clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For nutritional supplementation also for treating dietary shortage or imbalance

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Adenosine monophosphate also known as 5 adenylic acid and abbreviated AMP is a nucleotide that is found in RNA It is an ester of phosphoric acid with the nucleoside adenosine AMP consists of the phosphate group the pentose sugar ribose and the nucleobase adenine AMP is used as a dietary supplement to boost immune activity and is also used as a substitute sweetener to aid in the maintenance of a low calorie diet
